name: A Date with Chair-Kun
description:
A Date with Chair-Kun is a visual novel about you dating Chair-Kun.

#IkeBirthday2022 !

Note: If any glitch occurs in the game, please tell me through the comment section or in my twitter DMs (@natsbarnett)

FEATURES :

PriceFree to playEndings3 endingsCustomizationName + Pronouns

STORY:

Chair-Kun asked you on a date, you are going to live it through the eyes of Chair-Chan (changeable name), influence the ending of it by choosing a lot of things!

WHAT TO KNOW: 

This game was created for the birthday of Ike Eveland from Nijisanji! Since the Quilldren are so helplessly hitting on Chair-Kun.

CREDITS:

The music used in the game was made by:

VN Audio Pack

Composer/Sound Designer: Tim Reichert

Vocalist & Lyricist (I’ll be Here): Eliana Z.

Vocalist (The Power in my Hands): Terence Kern

Vocalist (Strange Melody): Yukari
